Content: The Customs officials have seized a consignment of refuse tea worth 3.5 million rupees. The Customs officials say that the plan of the culprits was to export 30,000 to 500,000 kilos of refuse tea in two containers to Iraq via the United Arab Emirates. The Customs Media Spokesman, Additional Customs Director General Sunil Jayaratne stated that further investigations are underway. Six suspects have been arrested in this connection.
